items.description: A question derived from the DELFI catalog.

id.description: The DELFI id this question is derived from.

name.description: A short title providing additional context to this question.

description.description: Details or further information describing this question.

image.description: A list of image urls that may help to clarify this question.

question.description: The actual question. It should be kept as short as possible while still being comprehensible and independent of the context in which it is asked.

input.description: This holds properties specifying the UI input element and its constraints.

type.description: The value type of the answer. This is closely related to the widget that will be displayed to the end user.

unit.description: An optional unit that will be displayed to the user.

decimals.description: An optional property to specify how many decimals are allowed for type Number.

values.description: A map of values with additional information for the user and the corresponding OSM tags.

conditions.description: A list of conditions where one must be met in order to ask this question. (Logical OR)

items.description: All specified properties must be met in order to evaluate the entire condition as true. (Logical AND)

osm_tags.description: A key value map of OSM tags that must be met in order to evaluate to true.

additionalProperties.description: If this is set to a boolean the corresponding osm tag either needs to exist or not independent of its value. An array means one of the given values must match the tag value.

osm_element.description: A single OSM element or list of elements. An array means one of the given elements must match.

difficulty.description: A number that indicates the difficulty of a question which can be used later to filter questions by different levels. Higher means more difficult.
